The trust factor system is kinda garbage and there's a lot of cheaters, but the game is very fun and well made and there are always third party matchmaking services like ESEA and FaceIt for when official matchmaking fails you. Surfing, bhop, kz and other game modes are also really fun, highly recommend this game.
